thread.section_title: Reuters: Financial Services and Real Estate
thread.title: Toys R Us goes into administration in Britain, putting 3,200 jobs at risk

title: Toys R Us goes into administration in Britain, putting 3,200 jobs at risk
text: February 28, 2018 / 10:00 AM / Updated 22 minutes ago Toys R Us goes into administration in Britain, putting 3,200 jobs at risk Reuters Staff 1 Min Read LONDON, Feb 28 (Reuters) - Retailer Toys R Us has gone into administration, the firm appointed to oversee the process said, putting 3,200 jobs at risk. Moorfields Advisory said that all stores were to continue trading until further notice. Toys R Us operates over 100 stores in Britain. (Reporting by Alistair Smout; editing by Guy Faulconbridge)
